answers.answer: hisorry about how you are feeling. i am in the same boat.  8 yrs of same problem, every test under the sun normal, been to many docs my self.  no one can tell me anything.  have t in my arms, throat too.  i take lyrica and zanaflex.  are you taking anything.  i have been recomended to go to a pain management cnter.  they have diffeent therapies so lets see.e  have u thought about pain management.

been to pain management. did not work for me.  they teach you how to breathe and sit. hard to breathe properly when it hurts to breathe period.sorry about your pain but i know the not knowing makes it worse. i have taken lyrica but to no avail. right now i am oxy contin and that helps but dont take away all pain. i have been on about everything. i feel like a pharmacy. i have been diagnosed with fibermyalgia and now they say they think it is RSD so who knows.
hilyrica not doing much for either.  i thought pain mangament gives meds?  any how i hope we get some help

question: Hi. Please help me find answers. 1st mri showed 3 buldging disc possible herniation, disc degenerative disease. nerve damage. 2nd mri normal. 3rd mri normal but pain more severe now than 6 years ago. hard to lay flat, sit,walk,stand, bend. body locks up and cant move. leg pain is stinging,zapping, throbbing. they hurt 24/7. been tested for diabetes and nerve test was normal even though i could not lay flat. i do not know what is causing pain but notheing showing up. docs thought it was fibermyalgia but no problem with arms and from what i heard fibermyalgia attacks limbs and moves around. pain so bad some days i beat my legs. i dont know why but i so sick of the pain and nothening to show what is causing it. its not in my head. any ideas? just had blood work done and everything normal. this is about 8th doc i have been too. thanks in advance.........
title: severe back and leg pain but mri normal
